name: Students' Activity Center
desc: IIT Kanpur provides rooms for all the clubs of Students’ Gymkhana in its Student Activity Centre (SAC) which is the hub of all the extracurricular activities of students. It also houses Open Air Theatre (OAT) with a seating capacity of over 1400 people which is used in almost every inter-hall competition like Galaxy, Takneek etc.

reviews.author: Mr. Kumar
reviews.body: Very nice place, all-nighters at OAT are the best!

reviews.author: Rohan
reviews.body: My girlfriend broke up with me here :(

name: Cafe Coffee Day
desc: CCD (Café Coffee Day) at IIT Kanpur is a popular hangout spot for students, faculty, and visitors. Located near the Library Fountains, it offers a cozy environment to relax, chat, or work on assignments over a cup of coffee. With a variety of snacks, beverages, and light meals, CCD serves as both a casual meeting place and a late-evening refreshment hub on campus.

reviews.author: Mrs. Gupta
reviews.body: Love the Devil's Own shake, give it a try
